text:
#Covaxin For #children Above 2 Years Will Be Available In By #September, Says #AIIMS Chief #randeepguleria 

He said that if #Pfizer-#Biontech's #vaccine gets a green signal in #India then that could also be an option for #children.

#COVID19 #coronavirus #vaccineren #unikarma https://t.co/NmWgPWqsmA
